message.content:
Step 1: Identify the line items corresponding to the required descriptions.

• Systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life => "Depreciation" which in the given statement has a value of 91505.05.

• Reduction in the amount of assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business, in production for such sale, or in the process of being manufactured during the period => In our statement, following the format of the example, this corresponds to " (Increase) Decrease in Inventory" which has a value of -485000.00.

• Net amount of cash and cash equivalents generated from an entity's activities that are the acquisition and disposal of long-term assets and other investments not included in cash equivalents and the receipt of interest and dividends => This is the "Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities" line, with a value of -0.00.

• Net addition in the amount of cash and cash equivalents during the period => This is captured by the "Net Increase" line, with the given value of -862455.97.

Step 2: Arrange the results in the original order as provided and format them as required in the json output.

Thus, the answer is:

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "91505.05",
    "value2": "-485000.00",
    "value3": "-0.00",
    "value4": "-862455.97"
  }
}
